alert.note: Alert for Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 17 at 4:23PM EDT until May 18 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 7 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol, Southern Plymouth and Dukes Counties. In Rhode Island, Western Kent County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 7 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
